Eric Schmidt said Page also will take the lead product development and technology strategy, while Sergey Brin will focus on strategic projects and have the title co-founder. As executive chairman, Eric Schmidt said he would concentrate on external deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships, government outreach and technology thought-leadership that are increasingly important, given Google's global reach, and act as an adviser to Page and Sergey Brin .
